org.apache.ambari.server.controller.internal

Class CalculatedStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.controller.internal.CalculatedStatus

  • public class CalculatedStatus
extends Object
    Status of a request resource, calculated from a set of tasks or stages.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CalculatedStatus.StatusType
      kind of HostRoleStatus persisted by Stage and Request

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CalculatedStatus ABORTED
      A status which represents an ABORTED state at -1%
      static CalculatedStatus COMPLETED
      A status which represents a COMPLETED state at 100%
      static CalculatedStatus PENDING
      A status which represents a PENDING state at 0%

    • Method Detail

      • getStatus

        public HostRoleStatus getStatus()
        Get the calculated status.
        Returns:
        the status

      • getDisplayStatus

        public HostRoleStatus getDisplayStatus()
        Get the calculated display status. The display_status field is used as a hint for UI. It's effective only on UpgradeGroup level. We should expose it for the following states: SKIPPED_FAILED FAILED
        Returns:
        the display status

      • getPercent

        public double getPercent()
        Get the calculated percent complete.
        Returns:
        the percent complete

      • statusFromTaskEntities

        public static CalculatedStatus statusFromTaskEntities(Collection<HostRoleCommandEntity> tasks,
                                                      boolean skippable)
        Factory method to create a calculated status. Calculate request status from the given collection of task entities.
        Parameters:
        tasks - the collection of task entities
        skippable - true if a single failed status should NOT result in an overall failed status
        Returns:
        a calculated status

      • statusFromStageEntities

        public static CalculatedStatus statusFromStageEntities(Collection<StageEntity> stages)
        Factory method to create a calculated status. Calculate request status from the given collection of stage entities.
        Parameters:
        stages - the collection of stage entities
        Returns:
        a calculated status

      • statusFromStages

        public static CalculatedStatus statusFromStages(Collection<Stage> stages)
        Factory method to create a calculated status. Calculate request status from the given collection of stages.
        Parameters:
        stages - the collection of stages
        Returns:
        a calculated status

      • calculateStatusCounts

        public static Map<HostRoleStatus,Integer> calculateStatusCounts(Collection<HostRoleStatus> hostRoleStatuses)
        Returns counts of tasks that are in various states.
        Parameters:
        hostRoleStatuses - the collection of tasks
        Returns:
        a map of counts of tasks keyed by the task status

        Parameters:
        hostRoleCommands - collection of beans HostRoleCommand
        Returns:
        a map of counts of tasks keyed by the task status

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • calculateTaskStatusCounts

        public static Map<HostRoleStatus,Integer> calculateTaskStatusCounts(Map<Long,HostRoleCommandStatusSummaryDTO> stageDto,
                                                                    Set<Long> stageIds)
        Return counts of task statuses.
        Parameters:
        stageDto - the map of stage-to-summary value objects
        stageIds - the stage ids to consider from the value objects
        Returns:
        the map of status to counts

      • statusFromRequest

        public static CalculatedStatus statusFromRequest(HostRoleCommandDAO s_hostRoleCommandDAO,
                                                 TopologyManager topologyManager,
                                                 Long requestId)
        Calculates the status for specified request by id.
        Parameters:
        s_hostRoleCommandDAO - is used to retrieve the map of stage-to-summary value objects
        topologyManager - topology manager
        requestId - the request id
        Returns:
        the calculated status

      • statusFromStageSummary

        public static CalculatedStatus statusFromStageSummary(Map<Long,HostRoleCommandStatusSummaryDTO> stageDto,
                                                      Set<Long> stageIds)
        Calculates the overall status of an upgrade. If there are no tasks, then a status of HostRoleStatus.COMPLETED is returned.
        Parameters:
        stageDto - the map of stage-to-summary value objects
        stageIds - the stage ids to consider from the value objects
        Returns:
        the calculated status

      • calculateSummaryStatus

        public static HostRoleStatus calculateSummaryStatus(Map<HostRoleStatus,Integer> counters,
                                                    int total,
                                                    boolean skippable)
        Calculate overall status of a stage or upgrade based on the given status counts.
        Parameters:
        counters - counts of resources that are in various states
        total - total number of resources in request. NOTE, completed tasks may be counted twice.
        skippable - true if a single failed status should NOT result in an overall failed status return
        Returns:
        summary request status based on statuses of tasks in different states.

      • calculateSummaryStatusFromPartialSet

        public static HostRoleStatus calculateSummaryStatusFromPartialSet(Map<HostRoleStatus,Integer> counters,
                                                                  boolean skippable)
        Parameters:
        counters - counts of resources that are in various states
        skippable - {Boolean} TRUE if failure of any of the task should not fail the stage
        Returns:
        HostRoleStatus

      • calculateStageStatus

        public static HostRoleStatus calculateStageStatus(List<HostRoleCommand> hostRoleCommands,
                                                  Map<HostRoleStatus,Integer> counters,
                                                  Map<Role,Float> successFactors,
                                                  boolean skippable)
        Parameters:
        hostRoleCommands - list of HostRoleCommand for a stage
        counters - counts of resources that are in various states
        successFactors - Map of roles to their successfactor for a stage
        skippable - {Boolean} TRUE if failure of any of the task should not fail the stage
        Returns:
        HostRoleStatus based on success factor

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Set of Role

                                           HostRoleStatus status)

        status - HostRoleStatus

      • didStageFailed

        protected static Boolean didStageFailed(List<HostRoleCommand> hostRoleCommands,
                                        Set<Role> roles,
                                        Map<Role,Float> successFactors)
        Parameters:
        hostRoleCommands - list of HostRoleCommand for a stage
        roles - set of roles to be checked for meeting success criteria
        successFactors - map of role to it's success factor
        Returns:
        {Boolean} TRUE if stage failed due to hostRoleCommands of any role not meeting success criteria

      • getHostRoleCommandsOfRole

        protected static List<HostRoleCommand> getHostRoleCommandsOfRole(List<HostRoleCommand> hostRoleCommands,
                                                                 Role role)
        Parameters:
        hostRoleCommands - list of HostRoleCommand
        role - Role
        Returns:
        list of HostRoleCommand that belongs to Role

      • getFailedHostRoleCommands

        Parameters:
        hostRoleCommands - list of HostRoleCommand
        Returns:
        list of HostRoleCommand with failed status
